Goblin_Infantry.name: Goblin Infantry
Goblin_Infantry.ability_text: When Goblin Cartographer reaches the 1/3rd mark of the lane, there is a 66% percent chance that it will teleport friendly units within 50px of it 1/3rd of the lane forward. There is a 34% chance friendly units within 50px will be destroyed.
Goblin_Infantry.special_attack: Goblin Wicker Man creates a shockwave that travels 20px and does 40 damage with 10px of knockback. This attack can only be made when it has >100hp

Goblings.name: Goblings
Goblings.flavour: A cross between a goblin and a rat. Lives in a huge network underground.

Goblin_Chieftess.name: Goblin Chieftess
Goblin_Chieftess.special_attack: Friendly Goblins within 50 px of Goblin Chieftess gain one stack of frenzy.

Goblin_Stuff_Thrower.name: Goblin Stuff Thrower
Goblin_Stuff_Thrower.flavour: Goblin Stuff Throwers are always comparing the contents of their sacks.
Goblin_Stuff_Thrower.special_attack: Goblin Stuff Thrower has an equal chance to fire a rock which deals 5 damage, a stick which does 4 damage, or a bomb which does 20 damage in a 10 pixel radius with 20 px of knockback

Goblin_Lunatic.name: Goblin Lunatic
Goblin_Lunatic.ability_text: Allied and Enemy Goblins will attack Goblin Lunatic. When Goblin Lunatic dies each goblin within 50px gets a stack of frenzy. Goblin lunatic takes 25% damage from goblins.

Bone_Javelina.name: Bone Javelina
Bone_Javelina.ability_text: When 3+ friendly units are within 10px in front of Bone Javelina, or when is kills a unit with its normal melee attack, it will consume them and gain an equivalent number of charges to its special attack.
Bone_Javelina.special_attack: Bone Javelina fires a projectile which does 55 damage.

Goblin_Trapper.name: Goblin Trapper
Goblin_Trapper.ability_text: When Goblin Trapper encounters a tiger trap being built, it will join in and halve the remaining construction time.
Goblin_Trapper.special_attack: Goblin Trapped becomes immobile and builds a tiger trap for 4s. Tiger traps deal 40 damage to enemy units that touch them and immobilize them for 3s.

Witch_Hunter_Bigot.name: Witch-Hunter Bigot
Witch_Hunter_Bigot.ability_text: Witch-Hunter Bigot deals 2x damage to Religious, Magical, or Futuristic targets.
Witch_Hunter_Bigot.special_attack: Witch-Hunter Bigot fires a projectile that inflicts the target with Marked for 10s. This attack can only target Religious, Magical, or Futuristic enemy targets.

Sacral_Sermonizer.name: Sacral Sermonizer
Sacral_Sermonizer.ability_text: Units touching Sacral Sermonizer lose all stacks of frenzy.
Sacral_Sermonizer.special_attack: All enemies within 60px a 50% chance of targeting Sacral Sermonizer, a 25% chance of being inflicted with Weakened for 2s, and a 25% chance of being Immobilized for 2s. This attack only fires when 3+ enemies are within range.

Poison Smuggler.name: Poison Smuggler
Poison Smuggler.special_attack: Poison Smuggler inflicts all enemy units within 20px with Poisonous for 5s, then gives you 20 energy. Poison Smuggler is destroyed.

Goblin_Guppy.name: Goblin Guppy
Goblin_Guppy.ability_text: When Goblin Guppy dies it inflicts all units that dealt damage to it with Rampaging for 5s.

Goblin_Demolitionist.name: Goblin Demolitionist
Goblin_Demolitionist.ability_text: Goblin Demolitionist will attack friendly and enemy buildings. When a building Goblin Demolitionist has dealth damage to is destroyed, is it replaced with Dangerous Rubble
Goblin_Demolitionist.special_attack: Goblin Demolitionist plants dynamite for 5s, then deals 200 damage to the target. This attack can only target buildings.

Goblin_Petard.name: Goblin Petard
Goblin_Petard.ability_text: When Goblin Petard dies it explodes and deals 40 damage to all units in a 10 pixel radius with 20px of knockback. Goblin Petard has no normal attack.
Goblin_Petard.special_attack: Goblin Petard jumps at the target building and explodes. This attack can only target enemy buildings within 30px. This attack destroys Goblin Petard.

Goblin_Wicker_Man.name: Goblin Wicker Man
Goblin_Wicker_Man.flavour: The shamanic art of lignumancy lives on in secluded copses.
Goblin_Wicker_Man.ability_text: Goblin Wicker Man drains 5hp/s from buildings it is passing. This effect can heal it beyond it's maximum hp. If Goblin Wicker Man has >50hp it gains 10 attack damage.
Goblin_Wicker_Man.special_attack: Goblin Wicker Man creates a shockwave that travels 20px and does 40 damage with 10px of knockback. This attack can only be made when it has >100hp.

Goblin_Cartographer.name: Goblin Cartographer
Goblin_Cartographer.ability_text: When Goblin Cartographer reaches the 1/3rd mark of the lane, there is a 66% percent chance that it will teleport friendly units within 50px of it 1/3rd of the lane forward. There is a 34% chance friendly units within 50px will be destroyed.

Goblin_Pope.name: Goblin Pope
Goblin_Pope.ability_text: Friendly Happy Goblins are Saved. Friendly Goblins move 50% slower.

Goblin_Trance_Potioneer.name: Goblin Trance Potioneer
Goblin_Trance_Potioneer.ability_text: When Goblin Trance Potioneer touches a friendly unfrenzied goblin there is a 1 in 3 chance that it will be destroyed and a 2 in 3 chance that it will be inflicted with frenzy.
Goblin_Trance_Potioneer.special_attack: Goblin Trance Potioneer throws a projectile that inflicts and friendly units with frenzy and deals 20 damage with 20px of knockback in 20px.

Archangel_Gikal.name: Archangel Gikal
Archangel_Gikal.ability_text: When Archangel Gikal is summoned all units are Saved, then Archangel Gikal destroys all units.

Goblin_Seraph.name: Goblin Seraph
Goblin_Seraph.ability_text: Goblin Seraph's health and attack damage are equal to the sum of the respective stats of the units who entered the Holy Crucible that made it.

Sacred_Psalm.name: Sacred Psalm
Sacred_Psalm.ability_text: Target ground. Sacred Psalm removes all stacks of frenzy from, slows, saves, and heals all units for 5hp in 50px.

Feed_The_Pure.name: Feed the Pure
Feed_The_Pure.ability_text: Target friendly unit is destroyed by Feed the Pure. Then Feed the Pure inflicts target friendly unit with 4 x frenzy.

Chosen_By_Gror.name: Chosen by Gror
Chosen_By_Gror.ability_text: Choses by Gror inflicts target friendly unit with 4 x frenzy.

Rebuke_The_Wicked.name: Rebuke the Wicked
Rebuke_The_Wicked.ability_text: Target ground. Rebuke the Wicked inflicts all enemy units within 50px with Fear for 4s.

Mozzberry_Bloat_Banishment.name: Mozzberry-Bloat Banishment
Mozzberry_Bloat_Banishment.ability_text: Target ground. A slow moving projectile is fired at that spot from the friendly side of the screen. On impact, heal goblins for 10hp and poison non-goblins within 10 px with 40px of knockback.

Rickety_Springboard.name: Rickety Springboard
Rickety_Springboard.ability_text: When 3+ units are in front of Rickety Springboard it throws all units standing on it 500px forward, damages them for half thier health, and inflicts frenzy on them.

Holy_Crucible.name: Holy Crucible
Holy_Crucible.ability_text: Holy Crucible destroys every third unit that passes it. When Holy Crucible is destroyed it creates a Goblin Seraph with health and attack damage equal to the units destroyed by Holy Crucible.

Snort_Machine.name: Snort Machine
Snort_Machine.ability_text: When a unit passes by it becomes immobilized for 1s while it uses the Snort Machine. The unit loses 10 health. Then, there is a 3 in 4 chance Snort Machine inflicts it with with frenzy and a 1 in 4 chance that you gain 5 energy. Only one unit can use Snort Machine at a time. Saved and Happy goblins will not use the Snort Machine.

Nook_And_Cranny.name: Nook and Cranny
Nook_And_Cranny.ability_text: When 2+ goblins are in front of Nook and Cranny, two of them will become immobilized and unsubstantial for 2s. After 2 seconds, Nook and Cranny produces a Goblin Guppy. All 3 Nook and Cranny inflicts all 3 units with Happy.

Baptismal_Bog.name: Baptismal Bog
Baptismal_Bog.ability_text: When a goblin passes in front of the center of Baptismal Bog, it inflicts all units in front of Baptismal Bog with Saved. Baptismal Bog can only do this once every 5 seconds.

Lumber_Camp.name: Lumber_Camp
Lumber_Camp.ability_text: Lumber Camp generates 1 energy per second if 1 or fewer buildings are touching it.
